snippet.title: BRUTAL DOOM Platinum 1.1 - All Weapons Showcase
snippet.description:
BRUTAL Doom Platinum is a continuation of BRUTAL DOOM Dox778 Personalized Addon, in overall the last version is quite similar to the newly released Platinum by Emerald. Remember that Platinum is a vastly improved version of vanilla Brutal Doom v21 with refreshed sprites, some new alternate fire modes to current weapons (glass and plasma shells, remote missile detonation, cryo modes, BFG Alpha firemodes etc etc.) and new weapons like Spider Mastermind's Autocannon together with that extremely dangerous Rocket Launcher of Cyberdemon. Heck, you even can FLY with Revenant's Launcher!

00:00 - Revenant's Launcher
00:30 - Chainsaw
01:00 - Pistol
01:30 - Submachine Gun
02:00 - MP-40
02:30 - Pump Action Shotgun
03:00 - Super Shotgun
03:32 - Assault Shotgun
04:02 - Assault Rifle
04:22 - Chaingun/Nailgun
04:52 - Light Machine Gun
05:22 - Rocket Launcher
05:55 - Grenade Launcher
06:22 - Plasma Rifle
06:58 - Railgun/Cryo Rifle
07:33 - Explosive Ordnance
08:03 - BFG 9000
08:40 - BFG 10000
09:00 - Unmaker
09:32 - Cyberdemon's Rocket Launcher
10:02 - Spider Mastermind's Autocannon
10:34 - Mancubus Flame Cannon

My Discord Server - https://discord.gg/skpZWagjTJ
Brutal Doom Platinum - https://www.moddb.com/mods/brutal-doom-platinum
Maps of Chaos - https://www.moddb.com/mods/brutal-doom/addons/brutalized-doom-and-doom-ii
SimpleHUD addons - https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?t=60356
ReShade - https://reshade.me/
